item.title: [PI] Items cost loaded from prices.txt? [pi]
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

Okay, so what I’m wanting to do is make my server a spawn server but, I want the items to cost money.

In order to do this i would have to load the prices of the items and integrate them into the ::item command right?

how do I go about doing this? I’ve tried so many times, and I’ve also searched EVERYWHERE.

here is my item command, please make it load items prices from prices.txt and require the player to have X amount of gp to spawn that item.

[code=java] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerRights >= 3) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Use as ::item 995 200 for example 200 gp”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			}
		}[/code]

Read full topic
